title: The 'Anahita' Diamond Grandeur: Rose Gold Necklace Set with Matching Jhumkas
materials: meticulously set. The diamonds are of VS clarity and exhibit exceptional brilliance. Finished with a durable
radiant Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: This stunning set features a layered, cascading design reminiscent of traditional South Indian temple architecture. The necklace displays a graduating array of diamond-studded leaf and teardrop motifs. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace design. Delicate filigree work adds a touch of vintage charm, while the rose gold provides a modern twist.
colors: Primarily rose gold with the sparkling white brilliance of diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and other celebratory events. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and red carpet events where you want to make a statement.
description: This set epitomizes timeless elegance and modern sophistication. The intricate diamond setting highlights the exceptional craftsmanship, making it a true heirloom piece. The Rose Gold is a contemporary take on classic South Indian Jewelry. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting, radiant shine.
